data.title: Novato Creek Watershed Upper Watershed Restoration Opportunities PowerPoint Presentation
data.meta_description: Novato Creek Watershed Upper Watershed Restoration Opportunities. Anatomy of a Watershed. Headwaters. Valley Floor. Estuary. Riparian Forest. Bay. Largest watershed in eastern Marin. Major Novato Creek tributaries. Novato Creek- Bowman Canyon Vineyard-Warner Wilson Arroyo Avichi Slideshow...

Little Tomahawk Creek Watershed

Little Tomahawk Creek Watershed. Eric Anderson Cody “The Crip” Charles Jansen. The Effects of Landscape Alteration on a Watershed. Logging Freeze/ Thaw Seasonal Changes Farming BMPs and stormwater management Development Residential Commercial Industrial. Some Real-world applications.

377 views • 22 slides

SMITH CREEK WATERSHED

SMITH CREEK WATERSHED . 68,000 acres Primarily agricultural and forestal uses I-81/US Rt. 11 corridor (GROWTH) Massanutten Mt./ GWNF Town of New Market. SMITH CREEK PARTNERSHIP. Informal meetings with landowners and agency/NGO representatives (3 since fall ’07) Goals:

242 views • 14 slides

Yellow Creek Watershed Restoration Coalition

Our Mission. To protect and improve the environment in the ~200sq mi Yellow Creek Watershed located in Carroll, Columbiana, Harrison, and Jefferson Counties. Research Water Quality HistoryInform and Involve the Public Develop Water Monitoring Programs Identify Resources to implement water quality improvement practices. Assist in the balance of the needs of the community and the stewardship in the resource. .

302 views • 9 slides

The UPPER MAUMEE WATERSHED

The UPPER MAUMEE WATERSHED. Mike Miller. Maumee Watershed. The Maumee River is formed in Fort Wayne at the confluence of the St. Mary’s (flowing north) and the St. Joseph (flowing south) The Maumee River flows northeast to Lake Erie through Toledo

The Cobbs Creek Watershed:

The Cobbs Creek Watershed:. This is why it matters. How it was. Modernization…. And its effect . Pollution from huge outfalls like these…. General Pollution…. Bank erosion, pipe exposure. But we can fix it. Even from our own homes. And make the creek a gateway….

BOOKER CREEK WATERSHED PLAN

BOOKER CREEK WATERSHED PLAN. WATERSHED ASSESSMENT WETLAND ASSESSMENT POLICY FRAMEWORK. BMP SUITABILITY. CONCLUSION. Paradox: Development occurring in areas where it is least suited and where BMP’s least feasible.

Lapwai Creek Watershed

Lapwai Creek Watershed. Lapwai Creek, mouth. Mission Creek. Sweetwater Creek, mouth. Sweetwater Creek, downstream. Stream Temperature Monitoring. Gauges used to monitor for turbidity were placed in Lapwai Creek tributaries. Data has been compiled and analyzed. Lapwai Monitoring Sites.
